title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language, including syntax, data types, and control structures.

title: Advanced C++ Programming
description: Dive deeper into C++ programming with topics such as object-oriented programming, templates, and memory management.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Get started with Python programming, covering basic syntax, data structures, and file handling.

title: Object-Oriented Programming in Python
description: Master the principles of object-oriented programming in Python, including classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Explore common data structures and algorithms used in software development, such as linked lists, trees, and sorting algorithms.

title: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
description: Build dynamic websites from scratch using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity.

title: Java Programming Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Java programming, including variables, loops, and methods, and start building your own Java applications.

title: Android App Development with Kotlin
description: Create Android apps using Kotlin, Google's preferred programming language for Android development, and publish them on the Google Play Store.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Discover the principles of machine learning and how to implement them using Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-Learn.
